# Punit Gauttam - Portfolio

> System Engineer & Data Visualization Expert at Tata Consultancy Services

## About

Punit Gauttam is a results-driven IT professional with 5+ years of experience specializing in Power BI development, data processing, and visualization. Currently delivering impactful solutions at TCS for enterprise clients.

## Core Expertise

- **Power BI Development**: Creating interactive dashboards, advanced DAX queries, and enterprise-grade analytics
- **Power Automate**: Building intelligent automation flows for business process optimization
- **SQL Server**: Database optimization, stored procedures, and query performance tuning
- **Power Platform**: End-to-end solutions using Power Apps, SharePoint, and Dataverse

## Technical Skills

### Data Visualization

### Database
- SQL Server (90% proficiency)

### Automation & Cloud
- Power Automate (88% proficiency)
- Power Apps (82% proficiency)

- Azure Databricks (80% proficiency)

## Professional Experience

### System Engineer at Tata Consultancy Services (Sep 2023 - Present)
- Developed 25+ interactive Power BI dashboards using advanced DAX and SQL queries
- Implemented Power Automate flows reducing manual reporting effort by 60%
- Migrated legacy reports to Power BI Service with Row-Level Security (RLS)

### Associate Engineer at Circulants Solutions Inc. (Oct 2021 - Jul 2023)
- Designed Power BI reports with drill-through, bookmarks, and custom DAX measures
- Built Power Automate workflows integrating SharePoint, SQL, and Power Apps

### Graduate Engineer at Circuitloop Technologies (Jun 2020 - Oct 2021)
- Built advanced Excel reports with pivot tables and macros for business analytics
- Managed SQL databases for e-commerce inventory tracking
